response.overview: A lesbian (Kenzie Taylor) and her straight male best friend (Seth Gamble) regularly pretend to be a married couple to take advantage of freebies. While at a resort pretending to be newly married, they decide to enjoy a free Nuru massage offered to them as part of their honeymoon package. They have no idea what Nuru is, but if it's a massage then it's sure to feel good. But when the masseuse (Cubbi Thompson) strips down and tells THEM to strip down too, Kenzie and Seth realize they're in trouble since they've never seen each other naked. Plus, they are BOTH attracted to Cubbi! As they get massaged, they try to keep up the ruse but eventually hit a snag when Cubbi offers them sex. Since Kenzie is supposed to be pretending that she's straight, she's afraid of messing up, but eventually allows herself to be seduced, which leads to a steamy threesome.
response.title: The Perks Of Married Life
